content: autumn sun makeup bag in this pattern there are 3 sizes for the everyday makeup bag 2 sizes for the makeup brush pouch and3 sizes for a to-go pouch gauge 20 stitches x 28 row = 10cm x 10cm on 4mm sizes widthxheight makeup bag 21x16 24x19 30x22 cm brush purse 9 5x19 12x21 cm to-go pouch 7x10 9x14 13 5x9 5 cm filcolana arwetta 50g-210m filcolana saga 50g-300m filcolana alva 25g-175m it s knit in either 2 strands filcolana saga and 1 strand filcolana alva 1 strand filcolana saga and 1 strand filcolana arwetta 2 strands filcolana arwetta or whatever matches the gauge pattern this pattern is worked from the top where the zipper is sewn in to the bottom where there is worked a 3 needle bind off to give the bag some structure ifyou prefer the sewn bind off you can of course do the kitchener stitch you can always add lining and do any closing/opening method you d like i vejust added zippers techniques 3 needle bind-off a 3 needle bind off is a way to join 2 sets of live stitches together you ll need 3 needles to do it as the name suggests first flip your work inside out so the right sidesface each other *insert your third needle into the first stitch on both needles and knit them together as if it were one stitch do this again and now you have 2stitches on the 3 round needle now you cast off the first stitch by pulling it over the second* and voila you have cast off 1 stitch with the 3 needle bind off now repeat from * to * until all stitches are bound off videos that might be helpful if you want to knitthis pattern long tail cast on longtail cast on for beginners 3 needle bind off video knitting help -
